title: Emerald Diamond Grand Haaram - Navaratna Elegance
materials: Crafted in 22K Gold with a Hyderabadi Polish for exceptional luster. Adorned with brilliant-cut diamonds (VVS clarity
G color) surrounding a central emerald and ruby. The pendant features a pear-shaped emerald and is finished with lustrous South Sea Pearls.
features: This exquisite Haaram features a floral motif pendant intricately set with diamonds, rubies, and a rich green emerald. The design showcases a blend of traditional South Indian artistry with modern diamond setting techniques. The bottom pendant is further enhanced by danging South Sea Pearls adding a touch of timeless sophistication.
colors: Primarily gold and white (diamonds) with striking accents of green (emeralds) and red (rubies). The creamy white of the South Sea Pearls complements the overall color palette.
occasions: and grand celebrations. Also suitable for upscale parties and red-carpet events where you want to make a statement.
description: This Haaram is a true heirloom piece, blending traditional South Indian design with the brilliance of modern diamond cutting. The use of high-quality emeralds, rubies, and South Sea Pearls ensures lasting beauty and value. The meticulous craftsmanship and Hyderabadi polish guarantee a piece that will be treasured for generations. Owning this Haaram is not just owning jewelry; it's owning a piece of South Indian heritage.
